text:
Mr. Raymond D. Hurlbert
-2-
January 4, 1962
made by NAEB and NETRC. Literally hundreds of people have
worked hard for passage of this legislation from the outset, many
of whom never participated in the hearings. The twenty thousand
copies have been distributed all over the United States.
As far as I know only one person has complained that his
name did not appear in the Report.
Sincerely,
David- c^Rwwart
Secretary, JCEB

cc: William G. Harley
